title: RIP Season 5
body:
You started out fun with a new jungle buffs, Rift Scuttler and a new Summoners Rift

Became broken with the {{item:3725}}  {{champion:113}}{{champion:79}}  and top laners taking {{summoner:11}} but became ok with some tweaks.
Broke again with {{item:3931}}  and {{item:3724}}  {{champion:11}} {{champion:102}}{{champion:76}} {{champion:81}} , steadied a little and ended up broken as f {{champion:41}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:82}}.

From Pantheon solo'ing Dragon level 2 to Mordekaiser creating his own Dragon. Its been a wild ride.

Thanks for the memories (and the new HUD).

Also {{summoner:32}} in ARAM.
